headline: MEIVAC INC. CRYO COOLED THROTTLE VACUUM VALVE ASA
specstable:
Manufacturer Meivac Inc.
Model CVQ-10-ASA-U-SM
Valve Actuation Electric
Flange Type ASA
Flange Size 254.00 mm (10.00 in)
Valve Material Aluminum
Accessories The CVQ selectively pumps the condensables on the surface of cryogenically cooled vanes while throttling the process gas at a differential pumping ratio of 20 to 3000 l/sec (process gas to condensables).
Other Information Stainless steel vanes
Flange I.D.: 9.868"
Flange O.D.: 16"
Bolt circle: 14.25"
12 bolts at 1" diameter
Exterior Dimensions
Width 16.000 in (40.6 cm)
Depth 2.000 in (5.1 cm)
